languageKey.label: Reporting
Debugging/Logging
Storage PID: Enter default page uid for storing imported records.
Force time limit (seconds): Change the maximun execution time for the import process. Defaut time limit is used if value = -1. See the manual for more details.
Email for reporting: When the import is executed automatically, you may receive a report about the execution if you set an email address (leave blank for no report).
Subject of email report: Set a subject for the email report. Additional information will be appended to that subject (i.e. "Full synchronization" ou "Synchronization of table x, index y").
Preview/Debug limit: The number of rows to show while doing a preview. Set to 0 for showing all. This also affects the debugging output.
Debug: Check to turn on debugging to the Dev Log. Debugging also takes place if TYPO3_DLOG is true. Requires devlog or similar extension.
Disable logging: Check to disable logging by TCEmain. Recommended if you don't need to keep close track of the import process.

External import synchronisation
This event is used to launch scheduled synchronisations of external data. It can synchronise all tables with external data definition in one call, or be called for a single table.

sync = [all | table_name]
Use "all" to synchronise all tables
Use a table name to synchronise only that table
Synchronization of table %1$s, index %2$d
Item to synchronize

External import
This task can be used to set up automated executions of external imports, be it for all tables in one go or for a single table.
All tables
